notes.title: Conflict of interest
notes.p: The authors declare that they have no conflicts of interest.

notes.title: Ethical approval
notes.p: All procedures performed in studies involving human participants were in accordance with the ethical standards of The First Affiliated Hospital of Guangzhou Medical University Ethics Committee and with the 1964 Helsinki declaration and its later amendments or comparable ethical standards.

notes.title: Informed consent
notes.p: This study is a retrospective study, and a formal consent is not required.
